search.query: |tstats count where `gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:instance) by name, resource.parent |rex max_match=1 field=name "\S+\/projects\/(?<projectid>\S+)\/(zones|regions|global|topics|subscriptions|serviceAccounts)\/\S*" |rename resource.parent as parent |rex max_match=1 field=parent "\S*\/projects\/(?<id>\d*)" |stats count by projectid, id |search id>0 |table projectid, id
search projectid=$project_id_tok$

|tstats dc(name) where `gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:instance) by ancestors{}, asset_type | rename ancestors{} as ancestors
|search asset_type=*Disk ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|search asset_type=*Instance ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|search asset_type=*Bucket ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|tstats dc(data.resource.labels.function_name) as number where `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="*cloud-functions" data.resource.labels.project_id=$project_id_tok$
|search asset_type=*Network ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|search asset_type=*Subnetwork ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|search asset_type="k8s.io/Node" ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number

|tstats count where `gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="k8s.io/Node" by name, ancestors{} |rename ancestors{} as ancestors |search ancestors=*$projectNumber$ |eval ClusterName=replace(name,"(^\S+clusters\/\S+)\/k8s\S*","\1") | stats dc(ClusterName) | rename dc(ClusterName) as number

|tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.protoPayload.methodName IN (*create*, *insert*) data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$)

|tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.protoPayload.methodName IN (*update*, *patch*) data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$)

|tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.protoPayload.methodName IN (*delete*) data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$)
rename projectid as Project_ID

|tstats dc(data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type) where `gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) by data.resource.labels.project_id, data.resource.type| rename data.resource.type as resourceType|stats count by resourceType

|tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) "data.protoPayload.methodName" IN ($create_del_tok$) AND data.resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) by _time, "data.protoPayload.methodName" span=$secs_for_bin$s | timechart span=$secs_for_bin$s sum(count) by data.protoPayload.methodName

|tstats fillnull_value="null" count where `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) (data.protoPayload.methodName IN ("*create*", "*insert*") AND data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission="*create*") by data.protoPayload.methodName, data.resource.type, attributes.logging.googleapis.com/timestamp, data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp, data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission, data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.name, data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resource | eval name1='data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.name' | eval name2='data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resource' | eval Name=if(name1="null", name2,name1) |search Name!="null" | rename "data.protoPayload.methodName" as Method, data.resource.type as "Resource Type", data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission as Permission, "attributes.logging.googleapis.com/timestamp" as Time, "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail" as Email, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp as "Caller IP" | table Method, "Resource Type",Permission, Name, Time, Email, "Caller IP"
